title: Creating team (or looking to join) for tomorrow's and future Sunday Mayhem Tournament

embed.description: Total Mayhem Gaming PresentsSunday Mayhem League of Legends 5v5 Weekly Tournament IMPORTANT THE RP PRIZING WILL DEPEND...

body:
Looking to play in a tournament tomorrow and bronze to gold tournaments in the future.

I'm Currently gold 4 can play adc/support looking for players to join my team or a team that I can join.

I am not fussed with your rank as I just want to play in a tournament again.

IGN Ryze bot

replies.body:
I have a team i will be starting up for the new year called, Team Digital Fury, so far its very small, but we're looking for players like ourselves who wish to better at the game we love and one day be a official team for the OCE label. If you want to ask any questions about it feel free to add me in game -shouri.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
i play all roles ill join if your still doing it but ig we could practice duo bot first?
